item.title: Y-Engine (Truth-Relevance-Novelty-Impact) — Daily KBC Note (2026-02-10)
item.description:
Unveiling the Y-Engine: Truth-Relevance-Novelty-Impact

In the realm of Knowledge-Based Currency (KBC), the Y-Engine plays a pivotal role in ensuring the quality and value of knowledge claims stored on the K-Chain. This innovative concept combines four essential elements - Truth, Relevance, Novelty, and Impact - to determine the veracity and significance of information. By understanding how the Y-Engine operates, we can appreciate its importance in shaping a trustworthy and dynamic knowledge economy.

item.title: Y-Engine (Truth-Relevance-Novelty-Impact) — Daily KBC Note (2025-12-06)
item.description:
Y-Engine (Truth-Relevance-Novelty-Impact): Unleashing the Power of Knowledge in KBC

Welcome, knowledge seekers, to a deep dive into the inner workings of the Knowledge-Based Currency (KBC) project. Today, we’re going to explore a key component that fuels the engine of truth, relevance, novelty, and impact within KBC: the Y-Engine.

Overview

The Y-Engine, comprised of Truth, Relevance, Novelty, and Impact, serves as the guiding force behind the validation and dissemination of knowledge within KBC. Let’s break down each component:
